div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 21:53 pm MDT

div.div: Mostly clear, with a low around 32. West northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 59. Breezy, with a northwest wind 10 to 20 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 32. North northwest wind 10 to 15 mph becoming northwest 5 to 10 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
